name: marks-tcl-extension
description: Mark's Tcl extension â€” Go To Definition, hover, completion and more

tcl.features.gotoDefinition.description: Enable Go To Definition (F12) for Tcl procs/methods.

tcl.features.hover.description: Enable hover preview for variables and procedures.

tcl.features.completion.description: Enable completion suggestions for Tcl procs/methods.

tcl.features.signatureHelp.description: Enable signature help when typing procedure calls.

tcl.index.externalPaths.description: Additional filesystem folders (absolute paths) to index for Tcl files.

enumDescriptions: Use local tclsh for syntax checking
Use remote syntax check service (requires server running)
tcl.runtime.syntaxCheckMode.markdownDescription:
Choose syntax checking mode:
- **disabled**: No syntax checking
- **local**: Use local `tclsh` executable
- **remote**: Use remote HTTP service

Only one mode can be active.

tcl.runtime.tclshPath.description: Path to tclsh executable for local syntax checking. Default: 'tclsh' (searches PATH).
tcl.runtime.tclshPath.markdownDescription: Path to tclsh executable for **local** syntax checking. Only used when `syntaxCheckMode` is set to `local`.

tcl.runtime.remoteUrl.description: URL of remote TCL syntax check service.
tcl.runtime.remoteUrl.markdownDescription: URL of remote TCL syntax check service. Only used when `syntaxCheckMode` is set to `remote`. Example: `http://localhost:8765/check`

tcl.runtime.syntaxCheckDelay.description: Delay in seconds before running syntax check after document change.
tcl.runtime.syntaxCheckDelay.markdownDescription: Delay in seconds before running syntax check after a document change. Higher values reduce checking frequency (useful for slow remote services). Range: 1-300 seconds.

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run package
